items.sentence: We had native guides on our trip to the mountain.
That book was so good that I read it three times.
Why did you all think that Tom liked heavy metal?
That's not the main reason Tom wanted to do that.
Tom often translates things into French for Mary.
Gestures can convey meaning as well as words can.
I don't know whether Tom is aware of that or not.
I think that Tom is going to ask for a promotion.
By the time I arrived, everyone had already gone.
I hope that Tom doesn't get lost on his way here.
